prompt: Build a flashcards study page with a retro aesthetic, featuring a cream-colored background with a subtle paper texture. Center a flashcard styled as a polaroid photo with a white border and slight tilt effect, displaying the question or answer in a typewriter font. Place a flip button below the card, styled as a red push-button with a glossy finish. Position navigation arrows on either side of the card, styled as retro arrow icons in black. At the top, show a progress indicator as a vintage counter (e.g., '1/10') in a bold typewriter font. Include a header with the title 'Literature Quotes' in a retro script font, with settings and menu icons in the top-right corner styled as old radio buttons. At the bottom, add a row of buttons for shuffle, restart, and favorite, styled as retro dials with red accents. Use a nostalgic, vintage design with subtle animations and a warm, analog feel.
